html:
2025-0667
2025-09-18FINIncome Tax ActRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Motor Vehicle Expenses and Benefits 2024-2025)Regulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Motor Vehicle Expenses and Benefits 2024-2025) in order to ensure that the capital cost ceilings, interest expense limit, leasing limit, tax-exemption per-kilometer allowance limit and the operating expense benefit rate reflect the underlying costs related to financing, acquiring or operating an automobile.Registration: SOR/2025-0193 Publication Date: 2025-10-08
subject: Regulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Motor Vehicle Expenses and Benefits 2024-2025)
precis: Regulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Motor Vehicle Expenses and Benefits 2024-2025) in order to ensure that the capital cost ceilings, interest expense limit, leasing limit, tax-exemption per-kilometer allowance limit and the operating expense benefit rate reflect the underlying costs related to financing, acquiring or operating an automobile.
